# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="b54d3-102">在 Outlook.com 中新增標幟及提醒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b54d3-103">若要設定或編輯事件的提醒：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-104">移至[行事曆](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-105">選取您想要提醒，相關的事件，然後選取右上角的箭號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-106">若要展開它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-107">**提醒我**] 旁邊，選擇 [提醒的時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="b54d3-108">Outlook.com 自動儲存您的變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b54d3-109">若要提醒自己來追蹤郵件上，您可以新增待處理標幟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-110">移至[郵件](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-111">在 [郵件] 清單中，將游標的訊息，請參閱 [標幟] 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-112">選取 [標幟] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-113">若要將郵件標示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b54d3-114">若要查看所有您已標幟的郵件，請選取核取記號，前往 [工作] 頁面上的左下角處。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="b54d3-115">若要深入了解，請[標幟或 pin 碼的郵件在 Outlook.com 中](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)讀取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b54d3-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
